Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class BidsController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.BidsController
@Controller public class BidsController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with carriers.
Since:
4/8/2022
Author:
Ian Black imb1007@sru.edu

  • Constructor Details

    • BidsController

      public BidsController(BidsRepository bidsRepository, ShipmentsRepository shipmentsRepository, CarriersRepository carriersRepository)
      Constructor for BidsController.
      Instantiates the bidsRepository
      Instantiates the carriersRepository
      Instantiates the shipmentsRepository
      Parameters:
      bidsRepository - Used to interact with bids in the database
      shipmentsRepository - Used to interact with shipments in the database
      carriersRepository - Used to interact with carriers in the database

  • Method Details

    • showBidList

      @GetMapping("/add-bid/{id}") public String showBidList(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, Bids bid, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Redirects user to the /add/add-bid page
      Adds shipments and carriers to the model
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the shipment being found
      model - Used to add data the model
      bid - Holds information for the new bid
      result - Checks entered data to ensure it is valid
      Returns:
      "/add/add-bid"

    • addBid

      @RequestMapping("/addbid") public String addBid(@Validated Bids bid, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds a bid to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      Adds the date, time, and logged in user to the bid.
      If there are no errors, the bid is saved in the bidsRepository. and the user is redirect to /bids
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /add/add-technician page.
      Parameters:
      bid - Holds information for the new bid
      result - Checks entered data to ensure it is valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/createdshipments" or "/add/add-bid"

    • deleteBid

      @GetMapping("/deletebid/{id}") public String deleteBid(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a bid using the id parameter and if found, redirects user to delete confirmation page
      Parameters:
      id - Holds the ID of the bid to be deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/createdshipments" or "/delete/deletebidconfirm"

    • deleteUserConfirm

      @GetMapping("/deletebidconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteUserConfirm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a bid using the id parameter and if found, deletes the bid and redirects to created shipments page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the bid being deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/createdshipments"

    • acceptBid

      @GetMapping("/acceptbid/{id}") public String acceptBid(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Accepts a bid from the carrier.
      Assigns a carrier, price, scac, and changes the full freight terms of a shipment.
      Updates the shipment using the shipmentsRepository.
      Parameters:
      id - Holds the ID of the bid to be accepted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/shipmentshomeshipper"

    • showEditForm

      @GetMapping("/editbid/{id}") public String showEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a bid using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that bid to a form and redirects the user to that update form. Also adds the shipments to the form.
      Adds shipments and carriers to the model.
      Parameters:
      id - Holds the ID of the bid to be edited
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "/update/update-bid"

    • updateBid

      @PostMapping("/updatebid/{id}") public String updateBid(@PathVariable("id") long id, @Validated Bids bid, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates a bid to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the bid is updated in the bidsRepository. and the user is redirected to /createdshipments
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /update/update-bid page.
      Parameters:
      id - Holds the ID of the bid to be edited
      bid - Holds the information on the bid that is being updated
      result - Checks if the inputs for the bid are valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/createdshipments" or "/update/update-bid"

    • getLoggedInUser

      public User getLoggedInUser()
      Returns the user that is currently logged into the system.
      If there is no user logged in, null is returned.
      Returns:
      user2 or null
